byline.original: By DANIEL VICTOR and KATIE ROGERS

abstract: Police in Albuquerque, New Mexico, say Tony Torrez has confessed to fatally shooting 4-year-old girl Lilly Garcia in road rage incident.
lead_paragraph: A tip from an anonymous caller had led to the arrest of Tony Torrez in the fatal shooting of a 4-year-old girl, Lilly Garcia, the police said.

headline.main: Albuquerque Road-Rage Suspect Confesses to Shooting That Killed Girl
headline.print_headline: Albuquerque Suspect Held in Road-Rage Death of Girl

snippet: A tip from an anonymous caller had led to the arrest of Tony Torrez in the fatal shooting of a 4-year-old girl, Lilly Garcia, the police said.
